AT.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
AT.description: Im aufregenden RPG Fossil Fighters: Frontier für Nintendo 3DS und 2DS können die Spieler in ihre Fahrzeuge springen und an exotische Orte fahren, um Fossilien auszugraben, die sich in lebendige Dinosaurier, im Spiel Vivosaurier genannt, verwandeln. Die Spieler kämpfen mit wilden Vivosauriern, denen sie auf ihren Ausgrabungstouren begegnen.

movies.name: Fossil Fighters Frontier: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

AU.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
AU.description: Dig into Fossil Fighters: Frontier on Nintendo 3DS and 2DS! In this exciting RPG, players can hop into their vehicles and drive around exotic locations to excavate fossils, which transform into real-life dinosaurs known as Vivosaurs. Players battle their Vivosaur with wild Vivosaurs they encounter on digging adventures.

BG.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
BG.description: Dig into Fossil Fighters: Frontier on Nintendo 3DS and 2DS! In this exciting RPG, players can hop into their vehicles and drive around exotic locations to excavate fossils, which transform into real-life dinosaurs known as Vivosaurs. Players battle their Vivosaur with wild Vivosaurs they encounter on digging adventures.

BE.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
BE.description: Plongez dans Fossil Fighters: Frontier sur Nintendo 3DS et 2DS ! Dans ce RPG captivant, les joueurs embarquent dans leurs véhicules et se déplacent dans des lieux exotiques afin de dénicher des fossiles qui se transforment en dinosaures dans la vie réelle et qu'on appelle Vivosaurs. Les joueurs utilisent leurs Vivosaurs pour combattre des Vivosaurs sauvages qu'ils rencontrent au fil de leurs aventures.

movies.name: Fossil Fighters Frontier : bande-annonce de lancement

ES.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
ES.description: ¡Adéntrate en el mundo de Fossil Fighters: Frontier para Nintendo 3DS y 2DS! En este emocionante RPG, los jugadores se suben a sus vehículos y conducen por exóticos parajes para desenterrar fósiles que se transformarán en auténticos dinosaurios vivos conocidos como Vivosaurs. Los jugadores deberán hacer luchar a sus Vivosaurs contra los Vivosaurs salvajes que se encuentren a lo largo de sus aventuras.

movies.name: Fossil Fighters Frontier: Tráiler de lanzamiento

IT.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
IT.description: Scopri Fossil Fighters: Frontier su Nintendo 3DS e 2DS! In questo emozionante titolo RPG, i giocatori possono saltare nei loro veicoli e guidare attraverso ambientazioni esotiche per trovare fossili, che si trasformeranno poi in veri dinosauri chiamati Vivosauri. I giocatori possono far combattere i propri Vivosauri con i Vivosauri selvatici che incontrano nella loro avventura!

movies.name: Fossil Fighters Frontier: trailer di lancio

movies.name: Fossil Fighters Frontier : bande-annonce de lancement

NO.description: Dig into Fossil Fighters: Frontier on Nintendo 3DS and 2DS! In this exciting RPG, players can hop into their vehicles and drive around exotic locations to excavate fossils, which transform into real-life dinosaurs known as Vivosaurs. Players battle their Vivosaur with wild Vivosaurs they encounter on digging adventures.

NL.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
NL.description: Zet je hakken in het zand voor Fossil Fighters: Frontier voor de Nintendo 3DS and 2DS! In deze spannende RPG kunnen spelers in hun voertuigen stappen en door exotische omgevingen rijden om fossielen op te graven. Die fossielen veranderen in levensechte dinosaurussen die Vivosaurs worden genoemd. Spelers moeten hun Vivosaur laten vechten met de wilde Vivosaurs die ze op hun tocht tegenkomen.

NZ.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
NZ.description: Dig into Fossil Fighters: Frontier on Nintendo 3DS and 2DS! In this exciting RPG, players can hop into their vehicles and drive around exotic locations to excavate fossils, which transform into real-life dinosaurs known as Vivosaurs. Players battle their Vivosaur with wild Vivosaurs they encounter on digging adventures.

PL.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
PL.description: Dig into Fossil Fighters: Frontier on Nintendo 3DS and 2DS! In this exciting RPG, players can hop into their vehicles and drive around exotic locations to excavate fossils, which transform into real-life dinosaurs known as Vivosaurs. Players battle their Vivosaur with wild Vivosaurs they encounter on digging adventures.

PT.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
PT.description: Fossil Fighters: Frontier é um novo RPG para as consolas Nintendo 3DS e Nintendo 2DS que convida os jogadores a saltarem para os seus veículos e a percorrerem locais exóticos numa missão para desenterrarem fósseis, que se transformam em dinossauros da vida real conhecidos como "Vivosaurs". Os jogadores combatem os seus próprios Vivosaurs com Vivosaurs que encontram nas suas escavações.

movies.name: Fossil Fighters Frontier: Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: Fossil Fighters™ Frontier
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Начните раскопки в Fossil Fighters: Frontier на Nintendo 3DS и 2DS! В этой увлекательной ролевой игре вы будете перемещаться по экзотическим локациям и проводить раскопки окаменелостей, которые превращаются в настоящих динозавров, также известных как «вивозавры». Выставляйте своих вивозавров против диких вивозавров, которых вы повстречаете во время раскопок.

movies.name: Fossil Fighters Frontier: трейлер к выходу игры

SE.description: Dig into Fossil Fighters: Frontier on Nintendo 3DS and 2DS!
